articles.author: John L. Dorman
articles.title: Gavin Newsom says Trump may try to withhold disaster aid for California: 'He's been pretty straightforward about that' - Business Insider
articles.description: In an interview with "Pod Save America," Newsom said Trump has been "pretty straightforward" about potentially denying federal aid to California.
articles.content:
Gov. Gavin Newsom of California said President-elect Donald Trump may seek to withhold federal disaster aid to California as multiple wildfires rage in and around Los Angeles.
"He's been pretty stra… [+3173 chars]
